name: Big D Randy
description:
Randy's is a HUGE mf whit big D. In the dark and whimsical world of Halloween, you play as a lil Bro character who must navigate a sprawling, nightmarish map in search of the precious candies scattered the map. But beware, for lurking in the shadows is that MF known as Big D.. Randy. He is really fast , and strong. He will chase when you cross he's view. The game give you funny and in the same time scary moments. Its fun to play and test your self in Big D Randy world.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

MULTIPLAYER AVAILBE .
